name: Hope's End
ability: Imperial Arms Vault: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on any planet you control, or draw 1 action card.

name: Primor
ability: The Atrament: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place up to 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

name: Mallice
ability: Exterrix Headquarters: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to gain 2 trade goods or convert all of your commodities into trade goods.
how to acquire: Acquired by taking control of the Wormhole Nexus.

name: Mirage
ability: Mirage Flight Academy: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to place up to 2 fighters from your reinforcements in any system that contains 1 or more of your ships
how to acquire: Placed in a system by use of the Mirage Frontier Card.

name: Custodia Vigilia
ability: Custodia Vigilia: While you control Mecatol Rex, it gains SPACE CANNON 5 and PRODUCTION 3. Gain 2 command tokens when another player scores Victory Points using imperial.
how to acquire: Research the I.I.H.Q Modernization faction technology.

name: Custodia Vigilia Ω
ability: Custodia Vigilia: While you control Mecatol Rex, it gains SPACE CANNON 5 and Production 3. Gain 2 command tokens when another player gains a victory point using the second clause of "Imperial."
how to acquire: Gain your breakthrough as the The Council Keleres player.

name: Mecatol Rex Ω
ability: The Galactic Council: You may exhaust this card and discard 1 secret objective at the end of your turn to draw 1 secret objective.

name: Thunder's Edge
ability: Jupiter Brain: Gain your breakthrough when you gain this card if you do not already have it. You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to perform 1 action.
how to acquire: Unlocked when the final expedition is completed. Once unlocked, can by taken control of as usual.

name: Styx
ability: A Song Like Marrow: When you gain this card, gain 1 victory point. When you lose this card, lose 1 victory point.
how to acquire: Acquired by taking control of its systems once The Fracture has been introduced. Must defeat the neutral units that are assigned to it before you can take control of the planet.

name: Ordinian
ability: 4X4ID "Hyperion" VI: You may exhaust this card when you pass to draw 1 action card and gain 1 command token.
how to acquire: One of the starting planets of Last Bastion. Can be taken from them as usual.

name: Avernus
ability: The Nucleus: ACTION: Exhaust this card to use the Embers of Muaat's STAR FORGE faction ability without spending a command token.
how to acquire: Gain your breakthrough as the Muaat player or take control of the planet from Muaat once they have unlocked it.

name: Emelpar
ability: The Acropolis: You may exhaust this card at the end of your turn to ready another component that isn't a strategy card.

name: Faunus
ability: Maxis Central Control: You may exhaust this card when you pass to gain control of a non-home, non-legendary planet that contains no units and has no attachments.

name: Garbozia
ability: Dok 'N Pic's Salvage Yard: You may exhaust this card when you pass to place 1 action card from the discard pile faceup on this card; you can purge cards on this card to play them as if they were in your hand.

name: Industrex
ability: Aeurex Mechanica: You may exhaust this card when you pass to place 1 ship that matches a unit upgrade technology you own from your reinforcements into a system that contains your ships.

name: Tempesta
ability: Ionian Fuel Refinery: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system to apply +1 to the move value of 1 of your ships during this tactical action.
